mapper.select: select s.aTYPE, s.PERIOD, s.PRICE, p.CITY, p.STREET, p.PRICE PLACE_PRICE, s.PRICE + p.PRICE TOTAL, p.ID ID from services s inner join places p on s.aTYPE = p.SERVICE_TYPE AND s.PERIOD = p.SERVICE_PERIOD;

select s.aTYPE, s.PERIOD, s.PRICE, p.CITY, p.STREET, p.PRICE PLACE_PRICE, s.PRICE + p.PRICE TOTAL, p.ID ID from services s, places p where s.aTYPE = p.SERVICE_TYPE and s.PERIOD = p.SERVICE_PERIOD and p.ID = #{id};
